item.title: R visualization of Jilin Epidemic
item.description: load packages require(tidyverse) require(leaflet) require(leafletCN) if(require(rgeos)){ require(rgeos) } else{ install.packages(("rgeos")) } require(rgeos) require(maptools) New epicenter in China: Jilin, Jilin Where is Jilin in China? Sys.setlocale('LC_ALL', "Chinese") ## [1] "LC_COLLATE=Chinese (Simplified)_China.936;LC_CTYPE=Chinese (Simplified)_China.936;LC_MONETARY=Chinese (Simplified)_China.936;LC_NUMERIC=C;LC_TIME=Chinese (Simplified)_China.936" Due to a problem of leafletCN package, which cannot distingguish Jilin city and Jilin province (also Hainan city and Hainan province), it cannot use demomap() to demo the map of Jilin city or province (also Hainan), see in a open issue in [github repo] (https://github.

item.title: Clinical notes: blood donation and syphilis test
item.description: In the afternoon, the patients in the inpatient department are quiet and fall sleep. I usually go to the outpatient department, where I can talk and ask questions to the doctors when they are free. A doctor said that: “Many people got syphilis and are not be aware of that, but it’s not a problem. Because nowadays, people take antibiotics often, you know, even for a cold. Treponema pallidum is so easy to be killed.
